original_text: And his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.
korean_text: 그의 발은 풀무불에 단련한 빛난 주석 같고 그의 음성은 많은 물 소리와 같으며

sentences.original_text: And his feet like unto fine brass
as if they burned in a furnace
and his voice as the sound of many waters
